message: Consider this an opportunity to invest in future high-quality products from us. Our selection process ensures a 50% chance of receiving a high-quality item next time. Thank you for your trust.
I appreciate the assurance of potential high-quality products in the future. Given the risk, I am willing to take a chance on this product.
